--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- Astroblast / Dead-End / Drag Strip ---
> 
> Astroblast, Dead-End, and Drag Strip automaticly follow Megatron, 
> chanting right after he finishes, "Hail Cybertron, Hail Megatron, 
and 
> destruction to the Autobots!"
> 


::Blindchaos and Domnijoe::

    Blindchaos sat back and smiled as the cheers went up. He appeared 
to soak up the atmosphere.
    Domnijoe, stunned that Megatron even remembered her, took a 
momment to recover before adding her own voice.
    "Slag the 'Bots!!" she cried. "Hail Megatron! Hail Cybertron!"


Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
